QuestData.Title: Shut it Down
QuestData.Description: My cousin over at Kota Basecamp mussed up. He mussed up bad.$B$BHe was too lazy to cut seeds out of kafa berries by hand, but he noticed goots eat the berries up and give back the seeds... in a day or so.$B$BHe fed everything he had to the goots on Kota Peak and now they're nuts! Chargin' everything that moves.$B$BKota used to be safe for Grummles to gather kafa. Not anymore. Not with them goots. Will you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Kafa-Crazed Mountain Goats on Kota Peak.
